mapper.select: select camera_id as cameraId, camera_code as cameraCode, t_site.site_id as siteId, site_name as siteName, lng, lat, t_camera.region_id as regionId, region_name as regionName from t_camera, t_site, t_region where t_camera.site_id = t_site.site_id and t_camera.region_id = t_region.id and t_camera.camera_id = #{cameraId}
select id, vehicle_distribution_name as vehicleDistributionName, vehicle_distribution_num as vehicleDistributionNum, date from t_vehicle_distribution where date = #{date}
select id, license_plate_color_name as licensePlateColorName, license_plate_color_code as licensePlateColorCode from t_license_plate_color
select id, license_plate_type_name as licensePlateTypeName, license_plate_type_code as licensePlateTypeCode, license_plate_type_describe as licensePlateTypeDescribe from t_license_plate_type
select id, vehicle_color_name as vehicleColorName, vehicle_color_code as vehicleColorCode from t_vehicle_color
select id, vehicle_display_goods_name as vehicleDisplayGoodsName, vehicle_display_goods_code as vehicleDisplayGoodsCode from t_vehicle_display_goods
select id, vehicle_sub_type_name as vehicleSubTypeName, vehicle_sub_type_code as vehicleSubTypeCode from t_vehicle_sub_type
select id, vehicle_type_name as vehicleTypeName, vehicle_type_code as vehicleTypeCode from t_vehicle_type
select id, vehicle_window_paste_color_name as vehicleWindowPasteColorName, vehicle_window_paste_color_code as vehicleWindowPasteColorCode from t_vehicle_window_paste_color
